title: Looking for Top and Support player Gold+ (Pref plat)
body: Hi guys, I have a ranked team who currently has two platinums and a diamond player on it - we are looking for a RELIABLE top and support player who can play regularly for us, we try and play most nights and would hope (depending on your availability) that you are able to as well, obviously not expecting ridiculous commitment however reliability is key, we're quite relaxed and generally aren't overly dickish or serious. If you're interested please leave your IGN below so I can add you ingame, thanks!

replies.body:
avs yeray / fml she was 14 
my 2 accs add any or both  D5
Interested , can play all roles, support well
S0lution, support player Plat 1 :) been looking for ranked team for awhile
